description:
Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Warlord in Prison! Jimbei, the Honorable Pirate!
Le Grand Corsaire emprisonné ! Jinbe, le paladin des mers
Toraware no Ouka Shichibukai! Kaikyou no Jinbee
Заключённый Шичибукай! Джимбей, первый сын моря!
囚われの王下七武海! 海侠のジンベエ
